comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: This is a great medical history shot.  Around this time, diphtheria, cholera, and TB were real problems in NYC.

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: That man looks either terrified, really tired or drunk.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: I hope Doc will plug those bullet holes in the guy's sternum, before he crawls into that plushy bunk bed we glimpse through the doorway . . . .

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Smallpox vaccination, most likely -- guy doing the vaccinating is holding a needle without a syringe.
